hero_lower: Creating applications that entertain and captivate audiences!
about_paragraph: My name is Skyler Riggle, and I'm a developer who enjoys crafting fun and intuitive experiences through software. I've worked with a wide variety of computer science disciplines, having worked professionally on everything from websites and backend services, to video games and embedded systems work. At the moment, I work as a freelance developer using ThreeJS to build interactive and engaging 3D website experiences. That said, I hope that my passion for this ever-expansive field can be of use to you and your next endeavor!
dev_services_note_text: Please feel free to reach out prior for a free consulation to discuss project scope and tier fit.
contact_subtitle: Get in touch to discuss your next project
